Class BaseController<T extends Entity,U extends SearchEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andrewpetrowski.diploma.bridgelib.Controllers.BaseController<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Database model which extends from Entity class
    U - Search model which extends from SearchEntity class
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DhtController
